Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product holds immense value to me, encapsulating years of dedication and innovation. Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. I am extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $8500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant savings compared to market rates. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $8,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $8,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
